question: can i get ride of stretch mark only by using natural pure vit. E?
question_content: can i get ride of stretch mark only by using natural pure vit. E?

answers.answer_content: A stretch mark is cause by the elastic breaking in your skin.  Nothing short of laser therapy can get rid of it.  Not a single cream or pill.  Don't waste your money.  And remember that nearly everybody has stretch marks...mostly beause your body grows too fast for your skin to keep up.
Sorry hon... Once  you have them they do not go away. The only thing that might happen is that they lighten up over time and are not so noticeable.
nothing gets rid of stretch marks so forget it.
Nup. NOthing maybe laser surgery but even that isnt 100%.

NO
